archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.6c: c) the methods and techniques being used to attack targets (i.e. threat events such as: placing individuals in the organisation to gather information; exploiting technical vulnerabilities; compromising external parties; or deploying targeted malware).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
